user_query: I'm organizing a company team-building event and I need to find a suitable venue in the city. Can you recommend some unique and interactive team-building activities? Additionally, provide me with a list of employees in our company whose names contain the word 'developer'.

TaskList.description: Search for suitable venues in the city for a team-building event.
Recommend unique and interactive team-building activities based on the venue information.
Query the company database for a list of employees whose names contain 'developer'.
